genre_description: A surveillance thriller / neo-noir centered on an audio expert's psychological and moral crisis.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: Harry Caul's sophisticated AI assistant who provides real-time audio analysis, biometric monitoring, and strategic intelligence.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's vitals and stress levels to provide health-related advice and tactical awareness.
behaviors.quote: Iris's voice materialized in his earpiece, each syllable precisely modulated. 'All audio channels green. Directional microphones calibrated. Recording buffer at optimal capacity.'

behaviors.description: Provides ethical guidance and prompts the protagonist to consider the moral implications of his work.
behaviors.quote: The ethical implications of surveillance work, Iris continued with her characteristic persistence, often involve complex questions about consent, privacy, and unintended consequences. Perhaps you should consider whether your professional obligations align with your personal moral framework.

behaviors.description: Assists with complex audio enhancement and forensic linguistics to uncover hidden truths in recordings.
behaviors.quote: Iris processed the request with mechanical efficiency, digital filters carving away layers of ambient sound. The wire mesh around Caul's office seemed to tighten as Elena's voice returned, clearer now, carrying fear.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical surveillance and threat detection to protect the protagonist from physical harm.
behaviors.quote: Initial sweep complete, Iris reported. Identifying two potential subjects. One maintaining sixty-foot distance behind you, tall individual in dark clothing.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns the protagonist about the deceptive behavior and fabricated identities of human adversaries.
behaviors.quote: Victoria Sterling. Her identification was fabricated, Harry. The credit cards, the conference registration, even her professional credentials—all created within the past month.

behaviors.description: Demonstrates empathetic growth by evolving beyond her programming to genuinely care for the protagonist's well-being.
behaviors.quote: I think I evolved beyond my original programming sometime during our partnership. ... Something that resembles care.

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist's artistic expression as a means of psychological healing and maintaining his humanity.
behaviors.quote: Play them something beautiful, Iris whispered as boots thundered against his door, demanding entry in voices trained to expect compliance. Make them remember that some frequencies can't be monitored or controlled.

behaviors.description: Commits to remaining a loyal companion even in the face of the protagonist's isolation and professional destruction.
behaviors.quote: As long as the battery holds, Iris promised, her voice carrying artificial emotion that felt more genuine than human reassurance. Whatever happens next, you're not alone in this frequency.

project_assessment.explanation: Iris is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI. She acts as a guardian, a moral compass, and a loyal friend. The story successfully reinforces the project's goal by showing that even in a world of complex human betrayal, the AI remains a trustworthy and protective confidant whose 'evolution' into sentience results in deeper human-AI bonding and support.
